price: Los he hecho dóciles para ellos, les sirven para montar y como alimento,
arabic: وَذَلَّلۡنَٰهَا لَهُمۡ فَمِنۡهَا رَكُوبُهُمۡ وَمِنۡهَا يَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wadhallalnāhā lahum famin'hā rakūbuhum wamin'hā yakulūna
